description: This file is a PHP source file that implements a Wi-Fi Spectrum Analyzer interface. It includes PHP scripts, embedded JavaScript for AJAX operations, and HTML markup for user interaction. The content suggests it is part of a troubleshooting or network management module, with functions for scanning Wi-Fi channels and displaying spectrum data.

methods.name: spanTable
methods.description: A JavaScript function that processes table rows to merge cells with identical content by adjusting 'rowspan' attributes.

methods.name: ajax_spec_analyzer
methods.description: AJAX function that initiates Wi-Fi spectrum analysis, handles the response, and updates the HTML table with spectrum data.
